HOME.TITLE: Welcome to Doutdes!
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Doutdes is a data analysis platform for companies. Through Doutdes, it is possible to integrate
HOME.DESCRIPTION_2: like Google Analytics, Facebook and Instagram Insights, Youtube Studio and more.
HOME.DESCRIPTION2: Thanks to Doutdes, therefore, you will be able to simplify and centralize your performance management on the web and social channels, finally from a single interface. The intuitiveness and ease of use will also allow you to quickly learn to
HOME.DESCRIPTION3: Doutdes is financed by Sardegna Ricerche and developed by the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science of the University of Cagliari, and is constantly evolving. New functionalities are periodically integrated, thanks to the suggestions and feedback of the companies that collaborate on development.
HOME.DASHBOARD_REPORT_1: Doutdes offers the possibility of configuring predefined and customized dashboards, with all the graphics needed to analyze the performance of its channels, generating the associated reports.
HOME.IMPO_EASY_1: Importing data from external sources such as Google Analytics or Facebook Insights onto the Doutdes platform is extremely simple. Authorize the operation in total security from your accounts.
HOME.USO_1: If you have problems configuring your dashboards, no problem! A special section is dedicated to step-by-step tutorials to help you become familiar with the tools.

DASHBOARD.MINICARD: The minicards are not available, as the business profile has been recently activated.
DASHBOARD.MINICARD_2: An error was encountered while loading the minicards.
DASHBOARD.NO_FBM: At the moment, you don't have access to a Facebook marketing page.
DASHBOARD.NO_FB: At the moment, you don't have access to a Facebook page. Create a page or become an administrator to observe its analytics here.
DASHBOARD.NO_GOOGLE: At the moment, you do not have access to a Google Analytics profile. Enter the monitoring snippet on a website to view its analytics here.
DASHBOARD.NO_INSTAGRAM: At the moment, you do not have access to an Instagram page with a business profile. Create a page or become an administrator to observe its analytics here.
DASHBOARD.NO_YOUTUBE: At the moment, you do not have access to a YouTube profile. Create a channel or become an administrator to observe its analytics here.
DASHBOARD.ALERT: Here there is nothing! Before you can view the data, you must add the

DASHBOARD.ALERT_3: The dashboard is empty. You can start by entering the first graph!
DASHBOARD.NEW_REPORT: We are creating your report, please wait ...
DASHBOARD.FACEBOOK_PAGE: Your Facebook account is associated with multiple pages. Which do you want to include in Doutdes?
DASHBOARD.GOOGLE_PAGE: Your Google Analytics account is associated with multiple websites. Which one do you want to include in Doutdes?
DASHBOARD.YOUTUBE_PAGE: Your Youtube Analytics account is associated with multiple channels. Which one do you want to include in Doutdes?

DASHBOARD.CONFERMA_SALVA: Are you really sure you want to save all changes?

DASHBOARD.CONFIRM_SALVA_ANNULLA_ALERT_TEXT: The cancellation of the temporary sorting mode will not save the changes made. Therefore the changes made will be lost and will no longer be recoverable.

PROFILO.NOME_ALERT: The name must be at most 40 characters long
PROFILO.COGN_ALERT: The surname must be at most 40 characters long
PROFILO.LUOGO_ALERT: The place of birth must not exceed 50 characters
PROFILO.COD_F_ALERT_1: The tax code must have 16 characters
PROFILO.INDIRIZZO_ALERT: The address must not exceed 50 characters
PROFILO.CITTA_ALERT: The City must not exceed 50 characters
PROFILO.PROVINCIA_ALERT: The province must not exceed 2 characters
PROFILO.SIGLA_PRO: The abbreviation of the obligatory province
PROFILO.SIGLA_PRO_LUNG: The abbreviation of the province must be a maximum of 2 characters
PROFILO.CAP_ALERT: The cap must not exceed 5 characters
PROFILO.PASSWORD_ALERT: The password must have at least 10 characters
PROFILO.UPDATE_DOM: Do you really want to update your information? You will be disconnected from the platform.

TUTORIAL_FB.TITLE: Tutorial: importing Facebook data
TUTORIAL_FB.DESCRIZIONE: In this guide, you can find instructions for importing the Facebook Insights API key (access token) useful to configure the personal dashboard of your website on
TUTORIAL_FB.DESCRIZIONE_1: Remember that you can click on any image to enlarge it. Finally, we inform you that the first 4 steps are temporary and will only be requested to users
TUTORIAL_FB.DESCRIZIONE_2: during the testing phase; when the application exits the beta phase, they will no longer be needed.
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_1: 1) To experiment with Doutdes, we will send you a notification on Facebook, with an authorization request. By clicking on the notification, you will first need to register as a Facebook Developer:
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_3: 3) Choose the option that describes your developer role in the app. We recommend that you select
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_4: 4) Once you have chosen your role, you will return to the authorization request we sent you. Conclude with
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_5_CONTINUE: in the sidebar and click on
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_6: 6) A pop-up will appear as in the image below. Click on
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_8: 8) Great job! You added your Facebook Insights su token
TUTORIAL_FB.STEP_8_CONT: . The statistics are now available on the platform!

API-KEYS.TITLE: Data sources
API-KEYS.NO_SORG: No external data source present. To add a new one, log in with the respective account and grant the permissions.
API-KEYS.ELIMINA_DOM: Are you really sure you want to remove the selected permissions?
API-KEYS.OPERAZIONE_PER_DESCRIZIONE: : the deletion of a data source involves the definitive removal from DoUtDes of all the data associated with the service. Some data, not being present on the external source,
API-KEYS.OPERAZIONE_PER_DESCRIZIONE_2: . It will not be possible to display the graphs associated with the service itself.
API-KEYS.AVVISO_1: deleting the Facebook service involves deleting the Instagram service contextually.
API-KEYS.ERR_DESC: An error occurred while accessing the requested service.
API-KEYS.ERR_DESCR_1: Try again later or contact technical support.

CARD.PROBLEM: The chart data could not be retrieved.
